t: Amazon Storefront (Stores) Guide | Amazowl
s: February 14, 2022 - They come as a replacement for Amazon Pages and offer a lot more content, options and flexibility. For example, merchants can now have dedicated pages for each of their product lines, use the advantage of HD Video and most importanlty, differentiate their brand from their competition. Stores offer another advantage, and it is that they come with their own dedicated links ...
